name: Xiangqi(Chinese Chess/象棋): Cannon(炮/砲) 's Attack
description:
__Important Note: Even if you don't know anything about [Xiangqi/Chinese Chess/象棋](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Xiangqi), you still can solve this Kata.__

___

# Cannon/炮/砲:

In this Kata, we will only take up one Xiangqi piece: Cannon.

* Cannon attacks by jumping over one piece (can be either enemy piece or own piece) and attacks the next one. There can be any amount of unoccupied space in between, including none.

```
example:
(C for cannon, X for enemy piece, O for own piece.)

XXC..O...X
^        ^
You can attack one of these two.

-----
Remember, you cannot attack your own piece.

OXC..O...O
^        ^
```

___

# Task:

You will get a string as input (1 Dimension), it will always start with `'C'` which means cannon.

And the rest of the string consists of `'X'`(enemy piece) and `'O'`(own piece).

You need to find the rightmost position which is reachable with any number of consecutive moves. Return the `index`(0-basis) of it.

__Note:__ Keep moving to the right might not be the correct solution, move to the left at some point might be a smart move, see the 8th move of left example and 3rd move of right example below.

___

# Examples:

```
Each column is one example:

input:                  input:
'CXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX'  |   'CXXOXXOXXOXXXXX'
 ^                  |    ^
                    |
1st move:           |
'.XCXXXXXXXXXXXXX'  |   '.XCOXXOXXOXXXXX'
   ^                |      ^
                    |
2nd move:           |
'.X.XCXXXXXXXXXXX'  |   '.X.OCXOXXOXXXXX'
     ^              |        ^
                    |
3rd move:           |
'.X.X.XCXXXXXXXXX'  |   '.C.O.XOXXOXXXXX'
       ^            |     ^
                    |
4th move:           |
'.X.X.X.XCXXXXXXX'  |   '...O.COXXOXXXXX'
         ^          |         ^
                    |
5th move:           |
'.X.X.X.X.XCXXXXX'  |   '...O..OCXOXXXXX'
           ^        |           ^, index 7
                    |
6th move:
'.X.X.X.X.X.XCXXX'
             ^
             
7th move:
'.X.X.X.X.X.X.XCX'
               ^
               
8th move:
'.X.X.X.X.X.C.X.X'
            ^

9th move:
'.X.X.X.X.X...X.C'
                ^, index 15
```

See more examples in sample tests.
